subject: The Friday Unwind: Your week in one smooth scroll
description_text:
Catch up on what’s happened this week — no stress, just the highlights.

View in browser (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VWyYvl700kPQW1_NZph3L5tT5W3NdgT55G78-RN3_3-J85n4LbW7Y9pgv6lZ3n4N3HfzhprqJ0tW7RFYbn4LfPZQN53f6DJkPp03W3mr3tl6xZGkwW5TFGgm8RlJqqVg4vHk1XCVm_W7Wxt4M79M7_ZW7Fxtfb42jSX6W7C2XmQ8zFRNrVQ13nV14HqLxW4qsW8W8T8__rW7Nn_Zx31b_-hW96ypGZ1DcGBlW280MrG3-yVVVV-l-3S70fWn4W8pbLhY1KMdpTW7vqCMH52mm9XMVDyQNpz4HhW8v34TF4BkpBPW1lSZ511dkF_8W2W6-Zq6wftlcW5X7G4Q1DXGklW3H4CFT1B_0zgV30bNp81DFvJW9hnWBq8kwBTMW35bFxR5TXnvhW48qzYq3XVjJLW6_8sMJ8vpySjW2tDVnq74vN7wW83RJKs99LCQNW7nH1Xx3XMN21W5rWz-c3gP5j6W7Y4-1_109_FmW7JldSx1MFQGsW8TzT3L324N_4W6CLHRh6rz6mXW4_QBRM3qWGkjW3LRh0P4y_WklW1Vxs3q3fcdNDVfzNQ436kgZPW7dpmYG31xkGnW6tkJSp5Q7YGLf38rs4004 )



Hey Atto,

Before you log off for the weekend, here’s your quick roundup of what’s new from Athos Commerce.

This week is packed with insights: from Google x Athos Commerce guidance for peak season, conversion tactics from Kick Game and big-picture thinking in Grow 25: Volume 4. We’ve also got new takes on TikTok Shop, peak 2025 prep, and an Oliver Bonas case study showing the real impact of smarter search and merchandising.

Catch you next Friday,

– The Athos Commerce Team





Featured This Week

? NEW Ebook | Grow 25: Volume 4 (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VWyYvl700kPQW1_NZph3L5tT5W3NdgT55G78-RN3_3-J83pyd0W7Y8-PT6lZ3l2W406XmV5Lj6lLW4ZQwgS3WMVq4W3VCzrc48T0MFW3zPBG356632jW4DHC611XkzVzW1LwrlN5FmQSMW1J1Nj93BZZ86W4QqFzd6Gth7hW4s4Gd54_NtM2W6vBdsx4VwqhVW19S4N43v-Km9W186yQS8q-13pW7F7Gb-28sxvMW3jvy0w8JJRvKW7wknd_7tFZK2VF6fpW93xw8qW1PlkQ934Rk1zVMQLYy1nMb3nN2TLMdSH7W4TW5Z3CbN8bXjy1W1NblQ55g1vYSW8Mh-gW1Sgr2GW2RHS2p6JdqSNW2nhrjd5Hs9kBW888t9X2SwJLhW2gH6JH8YyCmKf3jL5_q04 )

Technology is reshaping roles, redefining consumer expectations, and accelerating change faster than ever. Read insights from industry experts to understand the evolving relationship between humans, machines, and markets and what it means for the future of work and commerce.
